Name: (island name) Miles!
Achievement Description: You traveled a long way just to move to our little island, and you enrolled in the Nook Mileage Program. So you earned your first miles! There are lots of ways to earn miles by just enjoying island life!
Achievement Criteria: Unlock the Nook Mileage program

Name: Angling for Perfection!
Achievement Description: Learning how to fish is an essential skill for living on a remote island, hm? Nook Inc. encourages all island residents who are aiming to become fishing masters!
Achievement Criteria: Collect a specified number of fish

Name: Island Ichthyologist
Achievement Description: Fill in your Critterpedia with fish and earn miles along the way. Can you categorize each and every type of fish that swims in your island's waters, hm?
Achievement Criteria: Collect a specified number of unique fish

Name: Island Togetherness
Achievement Description: One of the goals of Nook Inc. is resident togetherness. Our gregarious-greetings initiative aims to reward you with Nook Miles just for chatting with residents. Try to talk to all your neighbors every day!
Achievement Criteria: Talk to each one of your villagers every day

Name: You've Got the Bug
Achievement Description: Earn miles just for catching creepy-crawlies! Every bug you catch is one that won't be surprising someone in their sock drawer.
Achievement Criteria: Collect a specified number of bugs

Name: Bugs Don't Bug Me
Achievement Description: You can earn miles for filling out your Critterpedia! Can you find every bug and unlock every entry? Yes, yes, you can! And please do consider supporting Blathers by donating bugs to the museum.
Achievement Criteria: Collect a specified number of unique bugs

Name: Have a Nice DIY!
Achievement Description: Nook Inc. will award Nook Miles for the number of DIY recipes you've collected. Think about that. You're earning...for learning! Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Collect a specified number of DIY recipes

Name: Deep Dive
Achievement Description: The glittering sea that surrounds our island is home to all kinds of captivating creatures. Put on your wet suit, dive in, and sea what you can collect to earn miles. Sea what I did there, hm?
Achievement Criteria: Collect a specified number of sea creatures

Name: Underwater Understudy
Achievement Description: There are still many creatures we have yet to discover at the bottom of the sea, hm? Earn miles by diving deep, capturing creatures, and filling out your Critterpedia. Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Collect a specified number of unique sea creatures

Name: DIY Tools
Achievement Description: If your tools break, just make more! And to take away the sting, you'll earn Nook Miles based on the number of tools you craft. Sweet deal!
Achievement Criteria: Craft a specified number of tools

Name: DIY Furniture
Achievement Description: Here's a win-win-win situation: Craft your own furniture. (Win!) Enjoy your handiwork. (Win!) Earn Nook Miles for the furniture you've crafted. (Win!) What could be better than that?
Achievement Criteria: Craft a specified number of DIY furniture

Name: Furniture Freshener
Achievement Description: Give your furniture that personal touch and you can unlock miles. The more items you refurbish, the more miles you can get, hm?
Achievement Criteria: Customize a specified number of furniture or tools using the workbench

Name: Rough-hewn
Achievement Description: Island development is Nook Inc.'s goal. We need a lot of materials to make that happen, so we're giving away Nook Miles based on how much wood you've chopped from trees.
Achievement Criteria: Chop a specified number of wood from trees

Name: Writing a Cookbook?
Achievement Description: The recipes in your collection could stretch for miles, so allow me to present you with these...miles! Delight the eyes and stomachs of your neighbors with all your delicious creations, hm?
Achievement Criteria: Learn a specified number of cooking DIY recipes

Name: Mmm-Mmm-Miles!
Achievement Description: Gathering ingredients and creating delicious treats is great fun, is it not? Yes, yes, I do believe our chefs out there deserve miles for all the times they've prepared something delicious!
Achievement Criteria: Cook a specified number of foods

Name: Trashed Tools
Achievement Description: Using a tool until it breaks is proof of your hard work! In praise of your good deeds, you're getting Nook Miles based on how many tools you've broken.
Achievement Criteria: Break a specified number of tools

Name: Rock-Splitting Champ
Achievement Description: You hit a single rock eight times in a row and knocked some things loose. But did you know that rock whacking is the activity that keeps on giving? Yes, yes! You're getting some Nook Miles now!
Achievement Criteria: Hit a rock with your shovel and obtain all 8 materials from that rock

Name: Bona Fide Bone Finder!
Achievement Description: Congratulations on finding your first fossil! Of course, you'll need some Nook Miles to commemorate the occasion. But don't celebrate too hard. There are more fossils to dig up! Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Dig up your first fossil

Name: Fossil Assessment
Achievement Description: Yes, yes! You're getting Nook Miles based on the number of fossils you've had assessed. Dig up as many as you can and find out what they are!
Achievement Criteria: Have Blathers assess a specified number of fossils

Name: Nice to Meet You, Gyroid!
Achievement Description: You've discovered your first gyroid! This special occasion deserves miles, yes, yes. I hope you feel inspired to collect all sorts of different, wonderful gyroids now.
Achievement Criteria: Dig up your first gyroid

Name: Gyroid Getter
Achievement Description: Collect different kinds of gyroids, and earn miles in return! I suspect once you experience life in their presence, you'll find it hard to resist hunting for more, hm?
Achievement Criteria: Touch specified number of unique gyroids

Name: Greedy Weeder
Achievement Description: Nook Inc. salutes you for your beautification efforts. Nook Inc. rewards you with Nook Miles for selling weeds. Nook Inc. is quite generous, no?
Achievement Criteria: Sell a specified number of weeds

Name: Flower Power
Achievement Description: Planting flowers makes our island more beautiful and can earn you miles. So...grow wild! Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Plant a specified number of flower seeds (digging up and replanting existing flowers does not count)

Name: Flower Tender
Achievement Description: If you encourage floral growth by showering the island's flowers with water, I'll encourage your growth by showering you with Nook Miles!
Achievement Criteria: Water a specified number of flowers

Name: Tomorrow's Trees Today
Achievement Description: To build a sustainable life on this island, we're going to need to plant a lot of trees! The more you plant, the more miles you can earn.
Achievement Criteria: Plant a specified number of trees (planting fruits or replanting existing trees does not count)

Name: Pick of the Bunch
Achievement Description: You'll get Nook Miles based on the amount of fruit you've sold. Remember: If you sell our island's specialty fruits on other islands, you might be able to get a better price!
Achievement Criteria: Sell a specified number of fruits

Name: Fruit Roots
Achievement Description: (island name)'s local fruit delicacy is a wonder, to be sure. But if you plant new varieties, guess what'll happen? Correct! You'll "grow" some Nook Miles! What you do with the fruit after that is up to you.
Achievement Criteria: Plant each type of fruit (cherry, orange, pear, peach, apple, and coconut)

Name: Shrubbery Hubbubbery
Achievement Description: Different kinds of shrubs usher in the different seasons with their flowers, yes, yes! Folks who plant many shrubs will receive beauty and miles as a reward.
Achievement Criteria: Plant a specified number of shrubs (replanting existing shrubs does not count)

Name: Sprout Out Loud
Achievement Description: Plant your produce starts across the whole island for a fresh, bounteous crop! Whether it's a small home garden or a full-on field, support Nook Inc. with all your produce-planting power! Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Plant a specified number of produce sprouts (replanting existing sprouts does not count)

Name: Executive Producer
Achievement Description: Nothing feels quite like harvesting produce that you grew by the sweat of your brow, yes, yes! Now go enjoy the fruits of your labor—and the pumpkins, carrots, sugarcane, and potatoes too!
Achievement Criteria: Harvest a specified number of produce

Name: Go Ahead. Be Shellfish!
Achievement Description: You can earn Nook Miles based on the number of seashells you sell. (That's not easy to say!) And remember: You'll get different amounts of Bells for different types of shells. So pay attention!
Achievement Criteria: Sell a specified number of seashells

Name: Clam and Collected
Achievement Description: Dig up clams, collect Nook Miles. It's really that simple. The real bonus here is that you get to walk along the beach for this one.
Achievement Criteria: Dig up a specified number of clams

Name: Trash Fishin'
Achievement Description: You work extra hard to keep our island clean, even going so far as to fish up trash out of our lovely waters. So you're getting some Nook Miles for keeping the island extra tidy, yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Fish a specified number of trash (cans, tires, or boots)

Name: Cast Master
Achievement Description: Cast your line carefully if you want to reel in this reward—you'll need to nab a bunch of fish in a row without a single one getting away to earn these miles.
Achievement Criteria: Fish a specified number of fish in a single streak without any getting away

Name: Dream House
Achievement Description: A home that you build yourself gives you greater livability—it's on a whole other level! I'll give Nook Miles to those who build or expand their home to taste the good life.
Achievement Criteria: Expand your home a specified number of times

Name: Decorated Decorator
Achievement Description: You got an S ranking from the Happy Home Academy! Your decorating skills are truly an inspiration, and you deserve some Nook Miles.
Achievement Criteria: Get an S ranking from the Happy Home Academy

Name: Hoard Reward
Achievement Description: Put more furniture in your house! Nook Inc. will give you Nook Miles based on the number of indoor furniture items you have. So you're earning rewards for making your house a home!
Achievement Criteria: Place a specified number of furniture in your house

Name: Good Things in Store!
Achievement Description: I'll reward you with miles based on the number of items you have in storage, hm? Using the convenient storage feature will make life on the island more pleasant!
Achievement Criteria: Store a specified number of items in your house storage

Name: Remarkable Remodeler
Achievement Description: You finished remodeling your house, hm? It looks like a completely new house now! I'll give you rewards based on the number of remodels you do, so keep it up!
Achievement Criteria: Remodel your home's exterior a specified number of times

Name: Smile Isle
Achievement Description: Good deeds are their own rewards. But go ahead and have some Nook Miles too for fulfilling requests from other island residents. Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Fulfill a specified number of requests from residents (such as returning lost items)

Name: Reaction Ruler
Achievement Description: You learned a Reaction! Let's celebrate this momentous occasion with...Nook Miles, hm? Reactions help you express yourself, so it's a good idea to learn them.
Achievement Criteria: Learn a specified number of reactions

Name: Island Shutterbug
Achievement Description: Congratulations on taking your first island photo! Please do show off your wonderful photos, whether they're impulse snaps or brilliant compositions.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you take a photo using the camera app on the NookPhone (screenshot button does not count, must use the app)

Name: Edit Credit
Achievement Description: Your passport has some information you can edit! Nook Inc. will give Nook Miles to folks who customize their profiles. Take it slow, think about it, and make it your own.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you edit your passport.

Name: NookPhone Life
Achievement Description: Gotten used to using your NookPhone? The fact that you're reading this probably means you have! Keep using it, and enjoy some Nook Miles just for getting familiar with it.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded after the 10th time you open your NookPhone

Name: That's One Smart Phone
Achievement Description: Nothing makes a smartphone manufacturer happier than a user who gets the most out of the device. At least, that's how Nook Inc. feels about the NookPhone. So we're giving you miles just for using your phone!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded after the 1000th time you open your NookPhone

Name: Shop to It
Achievement Description: Living on a remote island doesn't mean you have to go without life's luxuries. Shop to your heart's content with Nook Shopping and you'll earn Nook Miles!
Achievement Criteria: Number of times you've ordered from the Nook Shopping catalog

Name: Growing Collection
Achievement Description: You are aware that furniture and clothing you buy is added to your Nook Shopping catalog, yes? Were you also aware that you can earn miles for a large catalog? Well, you certainly are aware now!
Achievement Criteria: Number of unique furniture pieces you've added to your catalog

Name: Nook Miles for Miles!
Achievement Description: Earning Nook Miles for earning Nook Miles? Yes, yes! You just earned miles for finishing Nook Miles+ goals! But where will it end?
Achievement Criteria: Number of Nook Miles+ goals you've completed

Name: First-Time Buyer
Achievement Description: You won't get miles every time you buy something on the island, but your first time is special! Enjoy these miles, courtesy of Nook Inc.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you purchase an item from a shop

Name: Seller of Unwanted Stuff
Achievement Description: Selling things you don't need is a great way to keep down the clutter and earn a few extra Bells. And, in this case, a few extra miles! Hooray for your first sale!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you sell an item to a shop

Name: Moving Fees Paid!
Achievement Description: Thank you for paying all your fees for moving to the island! Take a Nook Miles rebate as a gift and give yourself a nice pat on the back, hm?
Achievement Criteria: Awarded when you pay off your initial loan using Nook Miles

Name: Bell Ringer
Achievement Description: Spending your Bells on the island helps revitalize the local economy, yes, yes! I'll reward you with miles based on how many Bells you've spent.
Achievement Criteria: Number of total bells you've spent in shops

Name: Miles for Stalkholders
Achievement Description: I have Nook Miles to give to any resident who purchases turnips. Buy them low, sell them high, and make a handsome profit! They'll rot in a week, though, so be careful.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you purchase turnips

Name: Cornering the Stalk Market
Achievement Description: The powers that be have been tracking your turnip transactions...and let's just say you've harvested your share of profits! Enjoy a few Nook Miles for helping contribute to the island's economy.
Achievement Criteria: Number of total bells you've profited from selling turnips

Name: No More Loan Payments!
Achievement Description: You see how this works? You pay off your loan, you get some Nook Miles! Thank you for doing business with Nook Inc.!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded after paying off your first house loan with bells

Name: Bulletin-Board Benefit
Achievement Description: Picture this: Getting Nook Miles from Nook Inc. the first time you write something on an island's bulletin board. Keep using bulletin boards to communicate with everyone on the island! Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you post a message on your town bulletin board

Name: Popular Pen Pal
Achievement Description: I'll reward you with miles if you send a lot of letters. Please keep sending letters to everyone and continuing to deepen friendships. Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Number of letters you've sent

Name: Flea Flicker
Achievement Description: Itchy fleas are a real hassle. If you see an island buddy struggling with fleas, by all means, help them out. Not only is it a nice thing to do, but you'll also get some miles for doing a good deed.
Achievement Criteria: Number of times you've caught fleas off a villager

Name: Cicada Memories
Achievement Description: Ah, cicada shells in the summer. They're not really all that useful, but collecting them does help create summer memories that will last a lifetime.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you catch a cicada shell

Name: Netting Better!
Achievement Description: It's so impressive when someone can catch five wasps in a row—so impressive, in fact, that you'll earn some Nook Miles if you can do it!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you catch five wasps in a row without running away or getting stung

Name: Pit-y Party
Achievement Description: Enjoy some bonus Nook Miles to commemorate the creation of your first pit. Just make sure you don't fall victim to your own handiwork!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you bury a pitfall seed

Name: Taking the Sting Out
Achievement Description: Getting stung by wasps hurts! Getting stung again before you can recover makes you faint! But at least you get some miles for that. I don't want you to be uncomfortable, though, so take some medicine to heal up!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you get stung by a wasp

Name: Faint of Heart
Achievement Description: This island is home to creepy crawlers that would make anyone light-headed. Maybe wielding a net will make you less likely to faint...
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you get knocked out by a Scorpion or Tarantula

Name: Overcoming Pitfalls
Achievement Description: Life is full of peaks and valleys, hills and pits. When you fall into a pit, you learn a lesson, hm? Be more careful next time, yes? Don't feel too bad, though. You're getting some bonus Nook Miles for your fall.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you fall into a pitfall hole

Name: Faked Out!
Achievement Description: Oh my. Did you get hoodwinked? That work of art you tried to donate turned out to be a forgery, and it stings. Your eye for art is being tested! Yes, yes! Please take some comfort in the miles I'm giving you.
Achievement Criteria: Donated a fake piece of art

Name: Lost Treasure
Achievement Description: Oh my. You popped a balloon with a skillful shot, but the attached prize fell into the water! Maybe some Nook Miles will help you recover from that sunken feeling, hm?
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time a balloon present you shot lands in a body of water

Name: It's Raining Treasure!
Achievement Description: No one knows who sends the gifts attached to balloons to our island, but you can earn miles by shooting them down and collecting what's inside.
Achievement Criteria: Number of balloons you've shot down with a slingshot

Name: Fun with Fences
Achievement Description: You can have a wonderful yard in no time by building a fence and surrounding your home or garden. Yes, yes! Nook Inc. will award Nook Miles to skilled fence installers.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you place a fence

Name: Snowmaestro
Achievement Description: What's this? You get Nook Miles based on how many quality snowfolks you've built? That's a pretty good deal for just having a little fun in the snow.
Achievement Criteria: Number of perfect snow-people you've built

Name: Wishes Come True
Achievement Description: Were you wishing for Nook Miles the last time you saw a shooting star? Hm? Because Nook Inc. is here to grant your wish. More wishes, more miles! Yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Number of shooting stars you've wished on

Name: Exterior Decorator
Achievement Description: You can display furniture outside, right? Well, here's a little incentive for you to show off what you've got—you'll earn Nook Miles based on the number of furniture items you set up outside.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you place some furniture outside

Name: (island name) Icons
Achievement Description: At Resident Services, we want new ideas for the island flag and island tune. We have Nook Miles in store for those creative types who can redesign and rewrite! It's good to take pride in our island symbols.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded for changing your island flag and town tune for the first time.

Name: Island Designer
Achievement Description: At Nook Inc. we encourage the use of the Island Designer app to liven up the island. We're giving away miles the first time you use a permit for a path, river, or cliff!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you use the Island Designer app to place a path, add/remove water, and build/destroy a cliff

Name: Wispy Island Secrets
Achievement Description: If you happen to encounter one of the island's secrets, maybe just keep it to yourself. We don't want to scare anyone away from here. Pretty sure that's in your island contract...
Achievement Criteria: Number of times you've helped Wisp find the parts of his spirit

Name: Gulliver's Travails
Achievement Description: When you come across someone in trouble on the beach, you help them, setting a fine example for all the island residents. Such kindness will surely find its way back to you.
Achievement Criteria: Number of times you've helped Gulliver fix his communicator

Name: K.K. Mania
Achievement Description: K.K. supports our island with his groovy brand of folk rock, so we should support him! The more K.K. shows you attend, the more Nook Miles you can earn.
Achievement Criteria: Number of K.K. shows you've attended

Name: True Patron of the Arts
Achievement Description: Collecting artwork contributes to the cultural quality of (island name), and Nook Inc. will give miles to folks who prove themselves discerning connoisseurs.
Achievement Criteria: Number of times you've purchased art that turned out to be real

Name: You Otter Know
Achievement Description: If you meet a laid-back fellow floating in the sea, consider sharing some of your scallops with him. You never know what you might learn in return...and a little gift never hurts either!
Achievement Criteria: Number of times you've given scallops to Pascal

Name: Set Sail for Adventure
Achievement Description: Rare items and exciting adventures are yours when you head out on a special tour with a veteran sailor, yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Number of times you've gone on a Kapp'n tour

Name: Come Home to the Roost
Achievement Description: The Roost, located on the second floor of the museum, is quite picky about the coffee they serve, yes, yes! Do stop in to enjoy a cup and earn some dark-roasted miles!
Achievement Criteria: Number of days you've gotten coffee from Brewster

Name: Stretch to Refresh!
Achievement Description: The health of our residents is a top priority, yes, yes! So we're holding group-stretching sessions in the plaza. I'll provide miles once per day for participating, and there will be a tape deck for music. I hope I see you there!
Achievement Criteria: Number of days you've participated in group stretching

Name: True Friends
Achievement Description: It's good news for Nook Inc. when island residents get along. Good relationships are a cornerstone of island development!
Achievement Criteria: Number of villagers you've become good friends with

Name: Birthday Celebration
Achievement Description: Celebrating the birthday of a fellow resident is a wonderful thing. Nook Inc. will commemorate your bond with some party-favor Nook Miles.
Achievement Criteria: Number of villager birthdays you've attended

Name: Happy Birthday!
Achievement Description: Happy birthday to you! Take some Nook Miles, woo-hoo! Happy birthday to you-oo! Take some Nook Miles, woo-hoo! (Get yourself something nice.)
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you play on your character's birthday

Name: Fishing Tourney!
Achievement Description: Please participate in the Fishing Tourney, which is held every spring, summer, fall, and winter! I'll give you Nook Miles as a reward the first time you participate each season.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you attend a fishing tourney in each season

Name: Bug-Off!
Achievement Description: What's the summer event to look forward to? That's right...the Bug-Off! Nook Inc. will give you Nook Miles for participating, so by all means, join the fun!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you attend a bug-off tourney in each season

Name: Countdown Celebration
Achievement Description: The only thing better than ringing in the new year is ringing in the new year with some Nook Miles! May you live to see many more—years and miles!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded for attending the new year holiday event

Name: Making a Change
Achievement Description: A closet is a must-have item for a fashion trendsetter. I'll offer Nook Miles to anyone who has a closet and changes outfits, thereby increasing the chances of an island fashion trend catching on.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you use a wardrobe to change your character's outfit

Name: First Custom Design!
Achievement Description: Learning to use the Custom Design app lets you personalize your clothes and furniture. So much fun to be had, yes, yes!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design app to edit or create a design

Name: Custom Design Pro!
Achievement Description: You upgraded to the Pro version of the Custom Design app, hm? That makes you a fine Pro Custom Designer. Yes, yes! I'll reward you with Nook Miles to commemorate your Pro debut!
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design pro app to edit or create a design

Name: Paydirt!
Achievement Description: I'll bet you didn't think you'd find buried Bells here, hm? But this is an island, after all. Buried treasure and whatnot. Enjoy some Nook Miles from Nook Inc. to celebrate your discovery.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded the first time you dig up bells from a shining spot

Name: Shady Shakedown
Achievement Description: Rumor has it that someone on this island likes to hide furniture in trees. Yes, yes! I'll give you Nook Miles based on the number of furniture items you shake out of trees. So get out there and shake!
Achievement Criteria: Number of furniture pieces you've found from shaking trees

Name: Golden Milestone
Achievement Description: If your tools are glinting gold, your account will be bursting with Bells soon enough. The paths to these tools are varied and secret, but you will have earned some Nook Miles for collecting them all.
Achievement Criteria: Awarded for each unique golden tool you've equipped (shovel, net, fishing rod, watering can, axe, and slingshot)

Name: Island and Yourland
Achievement Description: Support your neighboring islands with a visit now and again. The more you visit, the more Nook Miles you can earn! Here at Nook Inc. we like to reward your adventurous spirit, hm?
Achievement Criteria: Number of times you've visited another player's island (does not count mystery islands using Nook Miles Tickets)

Name: Host the Most
Achievement Description: To encourage you to invite plenty of guests to the island, we're offering miles as an incentive. The more the merrier— and that goes for Nook Miles too!
Achievement Criteria: Number of other players that have visited your island

Name: Active Island Resident
Achievement Description: Life on the island has lots of promise, hm? To illustrate this, I'll award you some Nook Miles based on the number of active days you've spent here. Please take them and enjoy them.
Achievement Criteria: Number of total unique days you've played the game
